mapper.select: select count(*) from channel_user as a, user as b where b.email = #{email} and a.user_no = b.no and a.channel_no = #{channelNo};
select no from user where email = #{email};

select a.channel_no as channelNo from crew as a, (select channel_no from channel_user where user_no = #{authUserNo}) as b, (select crew_no from crew_user where user_no = #{authUserNo}) as c where a.channel_no = b.channel_no and a.no = c.crew_no and a.no = #{crewNo};
select master_channel_user_no as masterChannelUserNo from channel where no = #{channelNo};
mapper.update: update channel set name = #{name} where no = #{no};
